full_summary:
### Construction Services for Canadian Diplomatic Locations – Worldwide
#### Source List to Inform Future Procurement

**Reference Number**: cb-882-65296184  
**Solicitation Number**: 23-238520  
**Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, November 28, 2023, 14:00:00 EST  
**Estimated Contract Value**: Individual project contracts ranging from approximately $2M to $4M.  
**ITQ Status**: Expired.

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites contractors to qualify for a source list to inform future construction procurements for various new and existing Canadian diplomatic locations worldwide. This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) will enable qualified and experienced contractors to demonstrate their knowledge, skills, and experience to implement quality physical upgrades.

The scope of work for the source list involves providing construction services for various Canadian diplomatic locations, including:

* New embassy office fit-ups
* Embassy space renovations
* Mechanical and electrical installations and upgrades
* Security works around embassy compounds (barriers, perimeter walls, gates, fences)
* Internal and external repair, renovation, and upgrade of building elements

The quality of construction and manufacturing will be ensured by direct supervision of work done by DFATD and a Canadian consultant representative, with strict adherence to approved construction drawings, specifications, and procedural requirements related to construction contracts.

Contractors will be required to exercise logistical efficiency during the entire construction process, including scheduling, progress reporting, change management, and on-site commissioning, among other tasks typical in building construction.

**Qualification Requirements**

To be eligible for the source list, contractors must:

* Be capable of providing the full range of services required in English or French
* Be able to travel to and perform construction works at various Canadian facilities around the world
* Demonstrate knowledge, skills, and experience in implementing quality physical upgrades
* Meet the requirements outlined in the tender document

**Tender Document**

The Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) document is available at the following link: `<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24618/isq-23-238520_0.pdf>`_

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

* Brent Hygaard
* realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
* (343) 573-5242
